fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Appoint stand-ins for a living player during the night. They do not need to be authorized. 3 Uses.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Stand-ins will remain appointed for a player permanently.
- When a player with stand-ins dies, the stand-ins will act on their behalf, allowing the player to continue using their day & night abilities past death.
- Deceased players with stand-ins appointed still may not vote, talk in living chats, or be targeted.
- Notifications of stand-ins will be forwarded to the Commisar.
- Attempts to appoint stand-ins for Unique roles or roles with no abilities will automatically fail.
- You will not be charged with an appointing use if your ability fails.
